Hayworth
   By Lukas Pleva August 11, 2010

Hayworth claims McCain opposed the border fence

   As the U.S. Senate race in Arizona heats up, the TV ads are getting more
   and more brutal.
Hayworth's ad claims that McCain opposed the border fence.

Hayworth
   stated on August 5, 2010 a TV ad against John McCain:
   McCain opposed the border fence.
